scripts.docs:asyncapi:all: bash -lc 'for f in asyncapi/*.asyncapi.yml; do name=$(basename "$f" .asyncapi.yml); out=asyncapi/html/$name; pnpm --package=@asyncapi/generator dlx asyncapi-generator "$f" @asyncapi/html-template -o "$out" -p singleFile=true --force-write; done'
scripts.docs:asyncapi:chat: pnpm --package=@asyncapi/generator dlx asyncapi-generator asyncapi/chat-microservice.asyncapi.yml @asyncapi/html-template -o asyncapi/html/chat -p singleFile=true --force-write
scripts.docs:asyncapi:gift: pnpm --package=@asyncapi/generator dlx asyncapi-generator asyncapi/gift-microservice.asyncapi.yml @asyncapi/html-template -o asyncapi/html/gift -p singleFile=true --force-write
